name: Xml Test
template:
<soap:Envelope xmlns:ns="http://oree.com.ua/etsua/soapsvc/bankaccountstatus/2020/09" xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope">
   <soap:Header><wsse:Security soap:mustUnderstand="true" xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd"><wsse:UsernameToken wsu:Id="UsernameToken-3D8E495A71D1035BD516125380512321"><wsse:Username>ukrgaz</wsse:Username><wsse:Password Type="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-username-token-profile-1.0#PasswordText">WFtCRyFJt3</wsse:Password></wsse:UsernameToken></wsse:Security></soap:Header>
   <soap:Body>
      <ns:UploadRequest>
         <!--Optional:-->
         <ns:BANKLIMITS answer-required="true" date-time="2020-10-26T18:51:13Z " dtd-release="1" dtd-version="1" id="5654" message-code="301">
            <!--Optional:-->
            <ns:SenderIdentification coding-scheme="NAME" id="UGB"/>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <ns:ReceiverIdentification coding-scheme="EIC" id="62X-OPERRYNKU--3"/>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <ns:Limits date="2020-10-26T18:51:13Z" title="FinancialLimit">
               <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
               <ns:Participant bankAccountId="1" bankCode="320478" dic="1" ean="1" edrpou="23697280" eic="0" iban="UA133204780000026007924864736" ic="1" name="АТ ДТЕК ДНІПРОЕНЕРГО" particId="1">
                  <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
                  <ns:DataGroups>
                     <!--Optional:-->
                     <ns:TotalsData>
                        <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
                        <ns:Data currency="UAH" type="limit" value="1121.42"/>
                     </ns:TotalsData>
                  </ns:DataGroups>
               </ns:Participant>
            </ns:Limits>
         </ns:BANKLIMITS>
      </ns:UploadRequest>
   </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>

name: Xml Body
template:
<ns:Participant 
                        bankAccountId="{{payload.participant.bankAccountId}}" 
                        bankCode="{{payload.participant.bankCode}}" 
                        dic="{{payload.participant.dic}}" 
                        ean="{{payload.participant.ean}}" 
                        edrpou="{{payload.participant.edrpou}}" 
                        eic="{{payload.participant.eic}}" 
                        iban="{{payload.participant.iban}}" 
                        ic="{{payload.participant.ic}}" 
                        name="{{payload.participant.name}}" 
                        particId="{{payload.participant.particId}}">
                        <ns:DataGroups>
                            <ns:TotalsData>
                            <ns:Data 
                                currency="{{payload.participant.data.currency}}" 
                                type="{{payload.participant.data.type}}" 
                                value="{{payload.participant.data.value}}"/>
                            </ns:TotalsData>
                        </ns:DataGroups>
            </ns:Participant>

name: simplify
SQL
template:
--select * from  dbo.UGB_MONOBANK(Date_Amount TDate)
declare @Date_amount DAteTime

set @Date_amount=(select m.Date_Amount from dbo.UGB_MONOBANK m)

create table #rez(amountid int)
insert into #rez(amountid)
select distinct
b.DebitId
from bills b with (nolock)
where b.DayDate=datediff(day,0,getdate())
and b.DebitId in

(
    SELECT a.id
    FROM amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
    WHERE a.iban IN('UA943204780000026026000003328', 'UA853204780000026025000003330', 'UA423204780000026022000003333', 'UA153204780000026025000003329', 'UA603204780000026021000003334', 'UA783204780000026020000003335', 'UA293204780000026040924894075', 'UA103204780000026008924894147', 'UA883204780000026201131375159', 'UA623204780000026080000179287', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA703204780000026084751101403', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA653204780000026033924899485', 'UA313204780000026084751101038','UA363204780000026022000003344')
    AND a.subcount = 0
)
and b.ProcessFlag&3=3
and b.Changed>=@Date_amount

union all
select distinct
b.CreditId
from bills b with (nolock)
where b.DayDate=datediff(day,0,getdate())
and b.CreditId in

(
    SELECT a.id
    FROM amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
    WHERE a.iban IN('UA943204780000026026000003328', 'UA853204780000026025000003330', 'UA423204780000026022000003333', 'UA153204780000026025000003329', 'UA603204780000026021000003334', 'UA783204780000026020000003335', 'UA293204780000026040924894075', 'UA103204780000026008924894147', 'UA883204780000026201131375159', 'UA623204780000026080000179287', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA703204780000026084751101403', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA653204780000026033924899485', 'UA313204780000026084751101038','UA363204780000026022000003344')
    AND a.subcount = 0
)
and b.ProcessFlag&3=3
and b.Changed>=@Date_amount


SELECT '1' AS bankAccountId
     , '320478' AS bankCode
     , '1' AS dic
     , '1' AS ean
     , c.StateCode AS edrpou
     , '0' AS eic
     , a.iban AS iban
     , '1' AS ic
     , c.name AS name
     , '1' AS particId
     , IIF(a.CurrencyTag = '', 'UAH', a.CurrencyTag) AS currency
     , 'limit' AS type
     , LTRIM(RTRIM(CAST(a.Confirmed AS CHAR))) AS value
FROM Amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
     JOIN clients c WITH(NOLOCK) ON c.id = a.ClientId
WHERE a.Id IN
(select r.amountid from #rez r)
ORDER BY a.Id


If isnull((select count(1) from #rez),0)<>0
begin
insert into dbo.UGB_ENERGORINOK(Daydate,Created,IBAN,Name,Confirmed)
select
datediff(day,0,getdate()),
getdate(),
a.iban,
a.ShortName,
a.Confirmed
FROM Amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
     JOIN clients c WITH(NOLOCK) ON c.id = a.ClientId
WHERE a.Id IN
(select r.amountid from #rez r)
ORDER BY a.Id


end

update m
set m.Date_Amount=getdate()
from dbo.UGB_MONOBANK m

drop table #rez
info:
--select * from  dbo.UGB_MONOBANK(Date_Amount TDate)
declare @Date_amount DAteTime

set @Date_amount=(select m.Date_Amount from dbo.UGB_MONOBANK m)

create table #rez(amountid int)
insert into #rez(amountid)
select distinct
b.DebitId
from bills b with (nolock)
where b.DayDate=datediff(day,0,getdate())
and b.DebitId in

(
    SELECT a.id
    FROM amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
    WHERE a.iban IN('UA943204780000026026000003328', 'UA853204780000026025000003330', 'UA423204780000026022000003333', 'UA153204780000026025000003329', 'UA603204780000026021000003334', 'UA783204780000026020000003335', 'UA293204780000026040924894075', 'UA103204780000026008924894147', 'UA883204780000026201131375159', 'UA623204780000026080000179287', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA703204780000026084751101403', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA653204780000026033924899485', 'UA313204780000026084751101038','UA363204780000026022000003344')
    AND a.subcount = 0
)
and b.ProcessFlag&3=3
and b.Changed>=@Date_amount

union all
select distinct
b.CreditId
from bills b with (nolock)
where b.DayDate=datediff(day,0,getdate())
and b.CreditId in

(
    SELECT a.id
    FROM amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
    WHERE a.iban IN('UA943204780000026026000003328', 'UA853204780000026025000003330', 'UA423204780000026022000003333', 'UA153204780000026025000003329', 'UA603204780000026021000003334', 'UA783204780000026020000003335', 'UA293204780000026040924894075', 'UA103204780000026008924894147', 'UA883204780000026201131375159', 'UA623204780000026080000179287', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA703204780000026084751101403', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA653204780000026033924899485', 'UA313204780000026084751101038','UA363204780000026022000003344')
    AND a.subcount = 0
)
and b.ProcessFlag&3=3
and b.Changed>=@Date_amount


SELECT '1' AS bankAccountId
     , '320478' AS bankCode
     , '1' AS dic
     , '1' AS ean
     , c.StateCode AS edrpou
     , '0' AS eic
     , a.iban AS iban
     , '1' AS ic
     , c.name AS name
     , '1' AS particId
     , IIF(a.CurrencyTag = '', 'UAH', a.CurrencyTag) AS currency
     , 'limit' AS type
     , LTRIM(RTRIM(CAST(a.Confirmed AS CHAR))) AS value
FROM Amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
     JOIN clients c WITH(NOLOCK) ON c.id = a.ClientId
WHERE a.Id IN
(select r.amountid from #rez r)
ORDER BY a.Id


update m
set m.Date_Amount=getdate()
from dbo.UGB_MONOBANK m

drop table #rez

name: 🡹P/D🡻

template:
/*
SELECT '<Participant name="' + a.ClientName + '" iban="' + a.IBAN + '" edrpou="' + a.StateCode + '" bankCode="300465">' + '<DataGroups>
<TotalsData>
<Data value="' + LTRIM(RTRIM(CAST(a.Confirmed AS CHAR))) + '" type="limit" currency="' + CASE
                                                                                             WHEN a.CurrencyTag = ''
                                                                                             THEN 'UAH'
                                                                                             ELSE a.CurrencyTag
                                                                                         END + '"/>
</TotalsData>
</DataGroups>
</Participant>' AS XML_OUT
*/

SELECT a.ClientName ,  a.IBAN, a.StateCode 
 , LTRIM(RTRIM(CAST(a.Confirmed AS CHAR))) 
 , IIF( a.CurrencyTag = '', 'UAH', a.CurrencyTag) CurrencyTag



FROM sv_Amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
WHERE a.Id IN
(
    SELECT a.id
    FROM amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
    WHERE a.iban IN('UA943204780000026026000003328'
	, 'UA853204780000026025000003330'
	, 'UA423204780000026022000003333'
	, 'UA153204780000026025000003329'
	, 'UA603204780000026021000003334'
	, 'UA783204780000026020000003335'
	, 'UA293204780000026040924894075'
	, 'UA103204780000026008924894147'
	, 'UA883204780000026201131375159'
	, 'UA623204780000026080000179287'
	, 'UA773204780000026207131375153'
	, 'UA703204780000026084751101403'
	, 'UA773204780000026207131375153'
	, 'UA653204780000026033924899485'
	, 'UA313204780000026084751101038')
    AND a.subcount = 0
) 
ORDER BY a.Id;

/*
SELECT * 
    FROM amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
    WHERE a.iban IN('UA943204780000026026000003328'
	, 'UA853204780000026025000003330')
*/

select
'<Participant name="'+c.FullName+'" iban="'+a.IBAN+'" edrpou="'+c.StateCode+ '" bankCode="300465">'+
'<DataGroups>
<TotalsData>
<Data value="'+ltrim(rtrim(cast(a.Confirmed as char)))+'" type="limit" currency="'+
case when a.CurrencyTag='' then 'UAH' else a.CurrencyTag end +'"/>
</TotalsData>
</DataGroups>
</Participant>'

from Amounts a with (nolock) 
join clients c with (nolock) on c.id=a.ClientId
where  a.Id in
(
select
a.id
from amounts a with (nolock)
where
a.iban in
(
'UA943204780000026026000003328',
'UA853204780000026025000003330',
'UA423204780000026022000003333',
'UA153204780000026025000003329',
'UA603204780000026021000003334',
'UA783204780000026020000003335',
'UA293204780000026040924894075',
'UA103204780000026008924894147',
'UA883204780000026201131375159',
'UA623204780000026080000179287',
'UA773204780000026207131375153',
'UA703204780000026084751101403',
'UA773204780000026207131375153',
'UA653204780000026033924899485',
'UA313204780000026084751101038'
)
and a.subcount=0
)

order by a.Id

name: SQL retrans

template:
/*
"participant" : {
   "bankAccountId" : "1" ,
   "bankCode" : "320478" ,
   "dic" : "1" ,
   "ean" : "1" ,
   "edrpou" : "23697280" ,
   "eic" : "0" ,
   "iban" : "UA133204780000026007924864736" ,
   "ic" : "1" ,
   "name" : "АТ ДТЕК ДНІПРОЕНЕРГО" ,
   "particId" : "1",

   "data" : {
       "currency" : "UAH" ,
       "type" : "limit" ,
       "value" : "1121.42"
   }
 }
}
*/

SELECT '1' AS bankAccountId
     , '320478' AS bankCode
     , '1' AS dic
     , '1' AS ean
     , c.StateCode AS edrpou
     , '0' AS eic
     , a.iban AS iban
     , '1' AS ic
     , c.name AS name
     , '1' AS particId
     , IIF(a.CurrencyTag = '', 'UAH', a.CurrencyTag) AS currency
     , 'limit' AS type
     , LTRIM(RTRIM(CAST(a.Confirmed AS CHAR))) AS value
FROM Amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
     JOIN clients c WITH(NOLOCK) ON c.id = a.ClientId
WHERE a.Id IN
(
    SELECT a.id
    FROM amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
    WHERE a.iban IN('UA943204780000026026000003328', 'UA853204780000026025000003330', 'UA423204780000026022000003333', 'UA153204780000026025000003329', 'UA603204780000026021000003334', 'UA783204780000026020000003335', 'UA293204780000026040924894075', 'UA103204780000026008924894147', 'UA883204780000026201131375159', 'UA623204780000026080000179287', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA703204780000026084751101403', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA653204780000026033924899485', 'UA313204780000026084751101038')
    AND a.subcount = 0
)
ORDER BY a.Id;

/*
SELECT * 
    FROM amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
    WHERE a.iban IN('UA943204780000026026000003328'
	, 'UA853204780000026025000003330')
	* FROM sv_Amounts
*/
/*
SELECT '<Participant name="' + a.ClientName + '" iban="' + a.IBAN + '" edrpou="' + a.StateCode + '" bankCode="300465">' + '<DataGroups>
<TotalsData>
<Data value="' + LTRIM(RTRIM(CAST(a.Confirmed AS CHAR))) + '" type="limit" currency="' 
+ CASE
    WHEN a.CurrencyTag = ''
    THEN 'UAH'
    ELSE a.CurrencyTag
  END + '"/>
</TotalsData>
</DataGroups>
</Participant>' AS XML_OUT
*/

name: trans
SQL
template:
/*
"participant" : {
   "bankAccountId" : "1" ,
   "bankCode" : "320478" ,
   "dic" : "1" ,
   "ean" : "1" ,
   "edrpou" : "23697280" ,
   "eic" : "0" ,
   "iban" : "UA133204780000026007924864736" ,
   "ic" : "1" ,
   "name" : "АТ ДТЕК ДНІПРОЕНЕРГО" ,
   "particId" : "1",

   "data" : {
       "currency" : "UAH" ,
       "type" : "limit" ,
       "value" : "1121.42"
   }
 }
}
*/

SELECT '1' AS bankAccountId
     , '320478' AS bankCode
     , '1' AS dic
     , '1' AS ean
     , c.StateCode AS edrpou
     , '0' AS eic
     , a.iban AS iban
     , '1' AS ic
     , c.name AS name
     , '1' AS particId
     , IIF(a.CurrencyTag = '', 'UAH', a.CurrencyTag) AS currency
     , 'limit' AS type
     , LTRIM(RTRIM(CAST(a.Confirmed AS CHAR))) AS value
FROM Amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
     JOIN clients c WITH(NOLOCK) ON c.id = a.ClientId
WHERE a.Id IN
(
    SELECT a.id
    FROM amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
    WHERE a.iban IN('UA943204780000026026000003328', 'UA853204780000026025000003330', 'UA423204780000026022000003333', 'UA153204780000026025000003329', 'UA603204780000026021000003334', 'UA783204780000026020000003335', 'UA293204780000026040924894075', 'UA103204780000026008924894147', 'UA883204780000026201131375159', 'UA623204780000026080000179287', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA703204780000026084751101403', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA653204780000026033924899485', 'UA313204780000026084751101038')
    AND a.subcount = 0
)
ORDER BY a.Id;

/*
SELECT * 
    FROM amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
    WHERE a.iban IN('UA943204780000026026000003328'
	, 'UA853204780000026025000003330')
	* FROM sv_Amounts
*/
/*
SELECT '<Participant name="' + a.ClientName + '" iban="' + a.IBAN + '" edrpou="' + a.StateCode + '" bankCode="300465">' + '<DataGroups>
<TotalsData>
<Data value="' + LTRIM(RTRIM(CAST(a.Confirmed AS CHAR))) + '" type="limit" currency="' 
+ CASE
    WHEN a.CurrencyTag = ''
    THEN 'UAH'
    ELSE a.CurrencyTag
  END + '"/>
</TotalsData>
</DataGroups>
</Participant>' AS XML_OUT
*/

name: env 1
env 2
mail to
today
localTZDates
SQL new
template:
--select * from  dbo.UGB_MONOBANK(Date_Amount TDate)
declare @Date_amount DAteTime

set @Date_amount=(select m.Date_Amount from dbo.UGB_MONOBANK m)

create table #rez(amountid int)
insert into #rez(amountid)
select distinct
b.DebitId
from bills b with (nolock)
where b.DayDate=datediff(day,0,getdate())
and b.DebitId in

(
    SELECT a.id
    FROM amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
    WHERE a.iban IN('UA943204780000026026000003328', 'UA853204780000026025000003330', 'UA423204780000026022000003333', 'UA153204780000026025000003329', 'UA603204780000026021000003334', 'UA783204780000026020000003335', 'UA293204780000026040924894075', 'UA103204780000026008924894147', 'UA883204780000026201131375159', 'UA623204780000026080000179287', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA703204780000026084751101403', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA653204780000026033924899485', 'UA313204780000026084751101038','UA363204780000026022000003344')
    AND a.subcount = 0
)
and b.ProcessFlag&3=3
and b.Changed>=@Date_amount

union all
select distinct
b.CreditId
from bills b with (nolock)
where b.DayDate=datediff(day,0,getdate())
and b.CreditId in

(
    SELECT a.id
    FROM amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
    WHERE a.iban IN('UA943204780000026026000003328', 'UA853204780000026025000003330', 'UA423204780000026022000003333', 'UA153204780000026025000003329', 'UA603204780000026021000003334', 'UA783204780000026020000003335', 'UA293204780000026040924894075', 'UA103204780000026008924894147', 'UA883204780000026201131375159', 'UA623204780000026080000179287', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA703204780000026084751101403', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA653204780000026033924899485', 'UA313204780000026084751101038','UA363204780000026022000003344')
    AND a.subcount = 0
)
and b.ProcessFlag&3=3
and b.Changed>=@Date_amount


SELECT '1' AS bankAccountId
     , '320478' AS bankCode
     , '1' AS dic
     , '1' AS ean
     , c.StateCode AS edrpou
     , '0' AS eic
     , a.iban AS iban
     , '1' AS ic
     , c.name AS name
     , '1' AS particId
     , IIF(a.CurrencyTag = '', 'UAH', a.CurrencyTag) AS currency
     , 'limit' AS type
     , LTRIM(RTRIM(CAST(a.Confirmed AS CHAR))) AS value
FROM Amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
     JOIN clients c WITH(NOLOCK) ON c.id = a.ClientId
WHERE a.Id IN
(select r.amountid from #rez r)
ORDER BY a.Id


If isnull((select count(1) from #rez),0)<>0
begin
insert into dbo.UGB_ENERGORINOK(Daydate,Created,IBAN,Name,Confirmed)
select
datediff(day,0,getdate()),
getdate(),
a.iban,
a.ShortName,
a.Confirmed
FROM Amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
     JOIN clients c WITH(NOLOCK) ON c.id = a.ClientId
WHERE a.Id IN
(select r.amountid from #rez r)
ORDER BY a.Id


end

update m
set m.Date_Amount=getdate()
from dbo.UGB_MONOBANK m

drop table #rez

--select * from  dbo.UGB_MONOBANK(Date_Amount TDate)
declare @Date_amount DAteTime

set @Date_amount=(select m.Date_Amount from dbo.UGB_MONOBANK m)

create table #rez(amountid int)
insert into #rez(amountid)
select distinct
b.DebitId
from bills b with (nolock)
where b.DayDate=datediff(day,0,getdate())
and b.DebitId in

(
    SELECT a.id
    FROM amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
    WHERE a.iban IN('UA943204780000026026000003328', 'UA853204780000026025000003330', 'UA423204780000026022000003333', 'UA153204780000026025000003329', 'UA603204780000026021000003334', 'UA783204780000026020000003335', 'UA293204780000026040924894075', 'UA103204780000026008924894147', 'UA883204780000026201131375159', 'UA623204780000026080000179287', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA703204780000026084751101403', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA653204780000026033924899485', 'UA313204780000026084751101038','UA363204780000026022000003344')
    AND a.subcount = 0

and b.ProcessFlag&3=3
and b.Changed>=@Date_amount

union all
select distinct
b.CreditId
from bills b with (nolock)
where b.DayDate=datediff(day,0,getdate())
and b.CreditId in

(
    SELECT a.id
    FROM amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
    WHERE a.iban IN('UA943204780000026026000003328', 'UA853204780000026025000003330', 'UA423204780000026022000003333', 'UA153204780000026025000003329', 'UA603204780000026021000003334', 'UA783204780000026020000003335', 'UA293204780000026040924894075', 'UA103204780000026008924894147', 'UA883204780000026201131375159', 'UA623204780000026080000179287', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA703204780000026084751101403', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA653204780000026033924899485', 'UA313204780000026084751101038','UA363204780000026022000003344')
    AND a.subcount = 0

and b.ProcessFlag&3=3
and b.Changed>=@Date_amount


SELECT '1' AS bankAccountId
     , '320478' AS bankCode
     , '1' AS dic
     , '1' AS ean
     , c.StateCode AS edrpou
     , '0' AS eic
     , a.iban AS iban

FROM Amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
     JOIN clients c WITH(NOLOCK) ON c.id = a.ClientId

ORDER BY a.Id

b.DebitId
from bills b with (nolock)
where b.DayDate=datediff(day,0,getdate())
and b.DebitId in

(
    SELECT a.id
    FROM amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
    WHERE a.iban IN('UA943204780000026026000003328', 'UA853204780000026025000003330', 'UA423204780000026022000003333', 'UA153204780000026025000003329', 'UA603204780000026021000003334', 'UA783204780000026020000003335', 'UA293204780000026040924894075', 'UA103204780000026008924894147', 'UA883204780000026201131375159', 'UA623204780000026080000179287', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA703204780000026084751101403', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA653204780000026033924899485', 'UA313204780000026084751101038','UA363204780000026022000003344')
    AND a.subcount = 0

and b.ProcessFlag&3=3

from bills b with (nolock)
where b.DayDate=datediff(day,0,getdate())
and b.CreditId in

(
    SELECT a.id
    FROM amounts a WITH(NOLOCK)
    WHERE a.iban IN('UA943204780000026026000003328', 'UA853204780000026025000003330', 'UA423204780000026022000003333', 'UA153204780000026025000003329', 'UA603204780000026021000003334', 'UA783204780000026020000003335', 'UA293204780000026040924894075', 'UA103204780000026008924894147', 'UA883204780000026201131375159', 'UA623204780000026080000179287', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA703204780000026084751101403', 'UA773204780000026207131375153', 'UA653204780000026033924899485', 'UA313204780000026084751101038','UA363204780000026022000003344')
    AND a.subcount = 0
)
and b.ProcessFlag&3=3
and b.Changed>=@Date_amount


SELECT '1' AS bankAccountId
     , '320478' AS bankCode
     , '1' AS dic
     , '1' AS ean
     , c.StateCode AS edrpou
     , '0' AS eic
     , a.iban AS iban
     , '1' AS ic
     , c.name AS name
     , '1' AS particId
     , IIF(a.CurrencyTag = '', 'UAH', a.CurrencyTag) AS currency

     JOIN clients c WITH(NOLOCK) ON c.id = a.ClientId

If isnull((select count(1) from #rez),0)<>0
begin
insert into dbo.UGB_ENERGORINOK(Daydate,Created,IBAN,Name,Confirmed)

datediff(day,0,getdate()),
getdate(),
a.iban,
a.ShortName,
a.Confirmed

     JOIN clients c WITH(NOLOCK) ON c.id = a.ClientId

name: Save lastRun
Restore lastRun

UPDATE m 
SET m.Date_Amount = '{{{lastRun}}}'
FROM dbo.UGB_MONOBANK m
